name: TimeZoneConvertor
0:
”Alexa ask time converter 6 am in Eastern Standard Time to Indian Standard Time”
”Alexa ask time converter now in Tokyo to New York”
”Alexa ask time converter 8 pm on June 16th in Pacific Standard Time to Sydney”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: time converter
des:
A tool that requires 
1. Time 
2. from Time Zone and 
3. to Time Zone 
as an input. 
You could provide any major city instead of a Time Zone.
Providing "date" in "from Time Zone" is optional.

All it returns is time in another time zone / another city.
